---
title: Stat 349 - Technical Skills for Statisticians
format: html
---


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
source("schedule.R")
library(DT)
schedule |>
  group_by(Week, weeksort, `Week Start`, Topic) |>
  summarize(`Important Dates` = if_else(is.na(`Important Dates`), NA_character_, paste(`Important Dates`, collapse = "<br>"))) |>
  unique() |>
  ungroup() |>
  arrange(weeksort) |>
  mutate(Topic = if_else(!is.na(Week) & Week < 16, sprintf("<a href='https://unl-statistics.github.io/stat349/weeks/week-%02d.html'> %s </a>", Week, Topic), Topic)) |>
  select(Week, Start = `Week Start`, Topic, `Important Dates`) |>
  datatable(escape = F, selection = 'none', filter='none', 
            options = list(paging = F, info = F, searching = F, ordering = F), 
                           rownames = F, style = "bootstrap") 
```
